nodes.text: Hanadak repellent was a magical device concocted by the Ewok Teebo on the Forest Moon of Endor in 3 ABY. When Teebo, Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka, and Latara went to look for their friend Wicket Wystri Warrick, who had gone to find the hanadak, Teebo brought the repellent with him for safety.
